paragraphs: Youse is a startup, a digital platform of Caixa Seguradora that aims to change how insurances are sold in Brazil. We focus on innovation and base our operation on agile methodologies.

Abril MÃ­dia is the IT department of Abril Group, the largest magazine publisher in the country with over 300 different magazines published annually. It sells 180 million issues every year with 4 million subscriptions.
